detail_desc: Blouse in an airy cotton weave containing some glittery threads. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with narrow, elasticated seams and flared cuffs.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Thin metal chain necklace with a rectangular pendant. Adjustable length. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication, a wide ribbed trim at the hem and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Leggings in soft, stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Short dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck, gathered elastication at the front for a draped effect, and short sleeves.

Coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Narrow notch lapels with a buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short top in smocked cotton jersey with broderie anglaise. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and overlocked edges.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
Straight-style, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with print motifs front, back and on the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Hipster briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace trims at the back. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Top in softly draping jersey with a sheen. V-neck with a wide lace trim, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Lace bras with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with a collar with ties and a button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill-trimmed shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and a gently flared, lined skirt.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with ties at the front and pin-tucks at the top. Decorative pompom trim around the yoke and down the front, gently dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with scalloped edges. Unlined.
Rib-knit hat with a wide, foldover hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and rhinestone-decorated buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with an asymmetric seam at the top, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Sleeveless dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a sheen. Narrow, braided shoulder straps that cross at the back, a double-layered top with a braided trim, and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery and lace details. Buttons at the top, an opening at the front, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slides with a braided jute trim around the soles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted, scoop-necked T-shirt in stretch jersey with a sheen.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

prod_name: Cali HW wide leg dnm trs
detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
Shortie briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Sleeveless top in a viscose crêpe weave with a unique nursing feature. V-neck with a pleat at the bottom, a frill trim around the armholes, and a gathered yoke at the back. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, straight-cut jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Shoulder tabs with a button, large flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, patterned slub cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a round neckline and gathered yoke front and back. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Fleece sports top with a funnel collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves. Zip at one side and elastication at the back of the hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey covered elastication at the waist and hole embroidery at the hems.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, seam at the waist and a skirt in double-layered tulle, the top layer with an all-over print.
Glittery hair clip with long, curly hair extensions. Length approx. 40 cm.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and contrasting colour longer layer with slits at the hem.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
5-pocket chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Satin-covered Alice band with a decorative tie detail at top. Decorated with sparkly stones.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and text print. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt top and bottoms in soft jersey with a print motif. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Ankle-length dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck and short sleeves with a tab and metal D-rings. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.

Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are made from COOLMAX®, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre blend that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Wide trousers in sturdy jersey with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side and sewn-in creases at the front.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length jersey leggings with wide elastication at the waist.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined hood, print motif and zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded jacket in felted fabric with a zip down the front, faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle, side pockets and faux fur cuffs. Lined.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a glittery print on the front, vertical seam at the back and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Lightweight jacket in soft faux shearling with flatlock seams, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front welt pockets and jersey trims around the opening, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Long dress in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Short sleeves with a flounced trim, seam at the waist with a tie belt, and a wide skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative flounce. Seam and flare to the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the side, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Two pairs of gold-plated metal hoop earrings. Diameter 1 cm and 2 cm.
